TopicTitle: I attempt to find the second "hidden" KSC, but it isn't there!

Articles.Content:
This really isn't a bug report, but just for the record:

Modded KSC 64-Bit Linux (Main mods in use: SCANSat, Firespitter)

0.25.0

-

So, I decided to find the second KSC after setting up a multi-satellite array in the queerest orbits.

Whatever, I went to the anomaly location, which I had a *rough* idea of before SCANSat---only to find nothing.

I did it correctly, at least?

What gives?

The plane I used was a solar/electronic plane with Firespitter electric propellers, mainly because I was far too lazy to use my long range, already built, probably circumnavigational craft. (And also because the electric engine HAS REVERSE! (Helps on steep landings)

Here are some images for your chewing pleasure:

*please help me find it* <3

Imgur:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Wait, does this still exist? I still cant find it, not sure if I'm in the right spot. Not even sure what branch of the forums this goes in.
When going ~270 over Kerbal "India", turn right to the third large mountain range and it`s at the south side

When going ~270 over Kerbal "India", turn right to the third large mountain range and it`s at the south side

Oh, then SCANSAT was wrong.

...

Really?

Oh, then SCANSAT was wrong.

...

Really?

It`s always been there, I fly blindly to it

Even the Kerbin Side map shows it there
